title: More demand for good, more demand for labor

content.question: For a competitive labor market, an increase in which of the following will lead to an increase in the demand for labor?

choices.label: The cost of medical benefits pro- vided to the labor hired by firms
The demand for the good that labor produces

content.answer: The demand for the good that labor produces

topic.text: 5.2: Changes in Factor Demand and Factor Supply

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
